pageContext.claim: “In the past, we have foolishly released hundreds and hundreds of dangerous terrorists, only to meet them again on the battlefield — including the ISIS leader, al-Baghdadi, who we captured, who we had, who we released.”
pageContext.analysis: Actually, it's 122 combatants over 15 years, not "hundreds and hundreds," who have been confirmed of re-engaging in terrorist activity. The ISIS leader Baghdadi was released to custody of the Iraqis, who later let him free.
